description: The comfort and ergonomics of a full-sized mouse, with the portability of one much smaller.Click in comfort.Flip the tail out to nearly double the over-body length of the Anker Flip-tail Mouse. What's the upside? The pit of your hand can rest comfortably on the ultra-soft rubber tail instead of the table.Fold-up portability.When heading out, easily slip the Anker Flip-tail Mouse into your bag. Setting up your mouse for clicking on the go couldn't be easier. Just flip the tail out to turn it on and get down to work.Keep it basic.A rubber scrolling wheel and a DPI adjustment button (1000 / 1500 / 2000) provide easy-to-use control without getting too complicated. The built-in auto-sleep mode conserves power to keep you going longer.
title: Anker® 2.4G Wireless Flip-tail Folding Mouse, 3 Adjustable DPI Levels, 2000 DPI, 4 Buttons, 18-Month Warranty - Black
